<title level="1" right="Trait">[Modular](/Traits.aspx?ID=807)</title>

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 274 <sup>1.1</sup>

The weapon has multiple configurations that you can switch between using an [Interact](/Actions.aspx?ID=2297) action. Typically, switching between configurations of a modular weapon allows it to deal different types of damage (listed in the trait, such as “modular B, P, or S”), though it's possible for a modular weapon's description to list more complicated configurations.
